creditline: Gift of funds from Darwin and Geri Reedy
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: half figure with bent arms free of the narrow torso and hands raised to the pointed breasts; furrowed coiffure topped by a large bowl-shaped receptacle containing vestiges of symbolic ingredients
dimension: 14 5/8 x 5 5/8 x 5 3/4 in. (37.15 x 14.29 x 14.61 cm) (including attached base)
marks: \"FX95449\", in white, PL side, bottom edge, on back
medium: Wood, animal skin and fur, other materials
title: Female Figure
